Name: Deadly Sin
About the game: Take on the role of Lorelai, a young woman of humble means who learns that her true identity is the heir to a powerful empire! Her quest will take her around the land of Dondoran. On her journey, Lorelai recruits the help of a charming cast of characters, as she seeks to unlock the secrets of her exile, destroy the seven deadly sins, and fulfill her destiny as the true princess! Game Features: Lovable, addicting characters Unique Steampunk setting Classic look, modern feel Stunning original soundtrack
